page.title: 16Famous Places and People
page.content: Wimbledon is best known for tennis.Players from all over the world come to the All England Tennis Club.During the Winter they would get wet from the rain,so now we have got the Wimbledon Indoor Tennis Club which was built in 1984 and which we can see from our school. Merton is also known for its connection with Nelson.Many pubs are named after him,and there are lots of pictures and monuments of him and of Lady Emma Hamilton.St.Mary's Church in Merton is very old.Nelson and Lady Hamilton used to visit this church.The churchyard also contains the tombs of John Innes and William Rutlish.
